case.title: big gurls need love too!
case.text: so, what would you like to do today? i am all alone for the week and i would like to enjoy some of that time off doing my own thing and some of that time off doing someone that is not my husband! lol i know that sounds bad but he really is the worst lover on the planet! i just need to get it given to me real good once in a while and then i will be good for a while!
